sentence__0: The selected birds have small and short cone shaped bills.
sentence__1: The selected birds have slim, small bodies.
sentence__2: If the bird's body is pigeon shaped, it's probably a selected bird.
sentence__3: The selected birds' tails are mostly solid colors.
sentence__4: If the belly is plain white or gray, it is most likely a selected bird.
sentence__5: Most of the selected birds have a solid grey primary color.
sentence__6: Almost all of the selected birds have a grey crown.
sentence__7: Many of the selected birds have a striped wing pattern.
